name: Pruett Black
text: Not much biting during the day. Tiny pin fish is all. Did see a manatee come by a few feet from me, that was pretty cool. Orange Beach could really use a legit fishing peer like they do in Gulf Shores.

name: Todd Hodges
text: Awesome spot

name: Bobby Coolidge
text: Beautiful beach

name: Carla Gwin
text: Beautiful here!!

name: Ajay patel
text: Interesting

name: Robert Bowers
text: Fishing was slow as to be expected with the weather and water conditions that evening.  The pier wasn't crowded at all.  There were only 2 other people there and they left shortly after our arrival.  A lot of big fish hang around the damn and can be caught very easily during peak feeding times using shad . It's a very quiet getaway that we use to escape the busy life .

name: Mac Kyles
text: Very clean and we really enjoy going there and relaxing.

name: Margie Gilbert
text: Loved being able to fish and actually catch something!

name: Poisondragonx
text: Cool place to hang out and camp and fish

name: Peter Chrome
text: I live near here and there's some good fish here

name: David Gilmore
text: Good place to fish

name: CARL OUTLAW
text: Nice place to visit

name: Sonya Lloyd
text: Launched the boat, went fishing, and had a great time.

name: Krystena Shuler
text: Beautiful peaceful place.  I love the owner, course he is my daddy ♥

name: Ann lay
text: Best boat dock and clean and nice

name: Steven Snow
text: Love being on the water

name: Heath Watson
text: Over priced  get crowded on weekends  but good safe launch

name: Travis Basile
text: Ok place

name: Sandra Stamps
text: Love like sure catch some good bass out of there

name: Marvin Curlee
text: Great marina and boat ramp.  The owner takes very good care of the place and has always been super friendly.

name: Bobby Raulerson
text: Caught cat fish

name: Cody Moore
text: Love it

name: Cassandra Ghioto
text: Friendly folks

name: Angie Miller
text: Love

name: Austin Jones
text: Captain Michael was great! I took my 6 year old daughter and she caught 15 fish by herself.

name: Jason Downard
text:
I have been on numerous charter trips and yes there are some competent boat captains  available and will likely supply an “ok” fishing experience for  you and your family but if you are  seeking a fantastic  trip with an exceptional
Captain  and Deckhand then you must go ahead and get booked on “Hooked Up”.  Me and my family, 6 total,  took a 6 hour trip targeting snapper we limited out  and moved on to other species. The deckhand works his butt off. Deckhand “Blake“  was like a little Tasmanian Devil on the deck. The Captain was so gracious and accommodating, my boys felt right at home on Captain Mikes beautiful Topaz. Captain and crew went out of there way to show my peeps a wonderful time. Lots of laughter and  new memories made on this trip. We had a blast. I hope anyone that books based on my review has a wonderful time like we did. We will be booking with these guys again. My wife is also posting a review as you check out our collective pictures you can tell we had lots of fun and did a lot of clowning around. Just look at the size of this king. Lol 😝

name: John Limbaugh
text: Mike has a great boat. He just bought it this winter. It's not brand new but it's in top shape.i can't wait to go fishing and catching soon.

name: Michael Shockley
text: Hooked Up! Putting fish in the boat with Captain Michael! Good times & great guy!

name: Paul Wimmer
text: Had a great time with Mike tons of fish Stand up Guy!!!! Awesome

name: Bob Rutledge
text: Great fishing with Michael as usual. We been going out for years. This year we caught red snapper!

name: Chris Aliment
text: Had a great time with Captain Michael last week with an offshore charter with some friends! This man knows loves to fish and knows how to catch them. We caught our limit of very large Trigger fish and lots of bee liners. Had a great experience and would recommend him to anyone looking to have fun going fishing offshore!

name: Caroline Jackson
text: Captain Mike and his awesome deckhand, Blake, offered us one of the best weekend's we've had fishing here in Orange Beach. Captain Mike was just as eager as we were to catch some good fish, and that is exactly what we did the entire time! We limited out with no problem after he continuously took us to spots where the fish were biting. Both Captain Mike and Blake were on top of everything all day long, making it easy and also relaxing for us. The boat was beautiful, clean, and comfortable, but their company was the best of all. If you're looking for a fishing guide that won't let you down, Hooked Up Fishing is the only way to go. I highly recommend booking with them, and truly hope my family and I get to fish with them again one day.

name: Patrick Grose
text: Went out today with Captain Mike and his deck hand Blake. This was my wife’s first ever deep sea fishing experience and it was phenomenal!!! We caught plenty of red snapper and my wife caught a small bull shark (she thought it was Jaws!).  Mike and Blake were great to fish with and very professional. I would highly recommend Hooked Up Charters for your next fishing experience in Gulf Shores!!!

name: David Beery
text: First class experience,  had a great time and caught plenty of fish. Laid back, easy going, and professional

name: lisa downard
text: I have been on several fishing charters but this was by far the BEST experience we have ever been on.  Captain Michael Thomas and deck hand (Blake) went out of their way to make it a perfect day.  They put us on the fish immediately.  If we spent a few minutes with no bites he was quick to move us to a better spot.  The deck hand (Blake) was so attentive.  Us girls never had to touch bait or wait for bait.  He was always ready and we kept him very busy.  They were fun to spend the day with even if we hadn’t caught fish.  When it was time to head back in the captain saw a spot with great potential for Mahi-mahi so he had us drop some lines.  My boys were sooo excited to catch mahi-mahi, king mackerel and lots of red snapper.  We will definitely go on this boat again!  Worth every dollar!

name: Quentin Kepfer
text: If you're considering fishing in the gulf it doesn't get any better than an outing with Mike and his fabulous deckhand! Mike went above and beyond our very high expectations. He personally took the time himself to ensure that my special needs son got his BIG snapper. We cant wait to get back and do it all over again.

name: Jesse Gruny
text: Awesome time, went today 3-19-20 am trip.  caught a  bunch of mangrove snappers and 6 sheepshead.  Went on inshore 4 hour trip.

name: Kourtney McCord
text: The best trip I've been on in a long time! We had a BLAST & caught some good fish! I HIGHLY recommend Hooked Up Fishing Charters! Orange Beach, AL

name: Ed Watson
text: Hooked Up Fishing Charters was great!  Captain Michael and his deck hand Blake were awesome!  They put us on the fish and we brought home a bunch of Snapper!

name: Marshall Malone
text: Great experience. Michael knows his stuff. Great for inexperienced fisherman. We enjoyed everything and caught lots of fish.

name: Blake Strawn
text: Went out this past Thursday and got our limit on snappers. It was tuff fishing as the seas were rougher than expected but capt Mike worked hard trying to keep us on the fish. Our next trip will be with him hopefully with better sea conditions lol.

name: Michael Thomas
text: We love to introduce kids to saltwater fishing

name: Shan Payne
text: Went out with Mike Thomas again this year he runs a great charter service and no doubt he is going to put you on the big snapper Made some great memories with my son and friends this year Looking forward to booking with Mike again next year Also this year he has added a first mate great young man and a hard worker

name: Tracie Morse
text: Captain Michael hooked us UP! Thank you for a great day and for your incredible "fishing hole" knowledge, for sticking with us to get our limit, for helping us reel them in, and for cleaning our catch so we could have a delicious dinner! You're the BEST!  HIGHLY recommend!

name: Jackie Fogel
text: My family and I contacted Captain Mike for my dad’s 60th birthday and the trip couldn’t have been better. My dad is a very hard man to impress, and we are already discussing our next trip! Mike was knowledgeable and extremely fexible and a pleasure to spend the day with. I would definitely recommend booking your trip with him.

name: Bill Willis
text: Captain Mike had us on the snapper right away on opening day this year. Every man limited out...then he put us on some fun fishing holes. Boat full of fish. Will be eating fish until opening day next year!

name: Bob Driscoll
text: Micheal Thomas did a great job putting us on fish all day long.  At the end of the day everyone was worn out from reeling in fish.  Great day on the Gulf with Captain Micheal.

name: Scott Young
text: Capt Michael definitely hooked us up!  Awesome all the way around!  He is driven to get your fish in the boat!  My go to charter for sure!

name: Jason DoreyMD
text: Last summer I caught a 35lb Red Snapper with Capt Michael Thomas with Hooked Up Fishing Charters. Besides a great trip he is a nice guy.

name: Matthew Cammack
text: Cap’n Michael knows how to have a good time and put you on some fish!

name: Jeff Lear
text: I've fished with Capt. Michael many times and I've never seen anyone who enjoys fishing as much as he does! Makes for an enjoyable day and we ALWAYS catch fish.

name: Annie Cinnamon
text: Nice quiet place to fish

name: Benjamin Lee
text: It's ok pond, no ducks tho. On wildlife management area.

name: Jean Griffiths
text: Conviently located right off I-10. Clean, safe campground. Has some sites right on Mobile bay. They also have some pull through spaces. We were in #8 back-in spot. Plenty of room for class A 38'. Full hook up sites. Lots of shady spots too. We're only here for 2 nights.

name: Joy Seeker
text: This is a very nice long fishing pier.   Good for fishing of course, but also walking and sightseeing. Birds in the bay, and beautiful scenery. Can see city of Mobile as you look out.

name: BaMaNuNa
text: Came here about a year ago. Great place to relax and fishing. People catching crabs here with a hook and bait. They just yank it over the pier and into the bucket.

name: jeff gunther
text: Ok place to camp if your on I10 heading east or west but could use a little more attention it appears the state has poured millions into its crown jewel gulf shores while slightingsome of its other parks

name: Doris Marsh
text: Wonderful!! Love it and everyone that helps make it a great place!!😊

name: Nancy Keyser
text: Love it

name: Steven P
text: Expensive

name: Harley Robinson
text: This pier was a nice place to look at the lake and I can remember going to it many times during my childhood. Sadly it's gone now. I'm unsure as to why but the pier is no longer there and all that sits in it's place is a steel railing.

name: Erika Deaton
text: Great place to sit and think. Beautiful scenery.

name: Will C
text: Great place to sit and look at the lake. There is a nice parking lot as well. There are a couple benches to sit and there are grills next to the benches. Then you can go to the fishing dock. But be careful because when I was there last a lot of the wood was rotten. Other than that it is a very pretty place to look at the lake. There are many trash cans and the area is very well maintained. I would recommend going here if you don’t have a boat and want to fish. Five Stars, would recommend

name: Kevin Pounders
text: It's beautiful there

name: michael holden
text: Well maintained.  Great place to fish or swim

name: Vickie Rutherford white
text: Best place around

name: pamela oliver
text: Beautiful

name: Bradley Harper
text: Great place for weekend camping

name: Tonya Mazingo
text: Fairhope Pier is so calming at sunset and we loved it! I highly recommend stopping by and seeing this beautiful place!!

name: angela harris
text: Most beautiful sunsets. Clean.  Sand to play in.

name: Barbara A Moore
text: Enjoyable. On a hot day it would be nice to have somewhere on the pier that you could buy a drink and a snack.

name: Dameion Jones
text: Nice pier very peaceful. Seems like it could be good fishing at times

name: wendy caswell (Hugabug)
text: beautiful day for Walking our English Bulldog named Sunshine it's her favorite spot

name: Maria Lechtreck
text: So relaxing, whether you get a sunset or not.

name: George Williams
text: This is almost certainly the best place to experience and capture sunsets in either Mobile or Baldwin county!! It's a very serene spot, and you basically never encounter a person who isn't friendly.

name: Kathy Prince
text: Beautiful place to watch the sunset!

name: Lynnea Jeffery
text: Always a BEAUTIFUL Sunset!!!

name: Kevin M
text: Beautiful spot. Lots of activity.

name: Jeffery Cowen
text: One of the nicer piers in Guntersville.   Nice place to relax.

name: leonard mcguire
text: Great place to fish if you don't have boat

name: Shane Dick
text: Great dock, great for running up and grabbing some dinner after a hard day of fishing.

name: Kathy Coby
text: Great selection. But pricey.

name: Stella Martinez
text: Beautiful Beautiful

name: Diane Feltner
text: Beautiful place

name: Garrett Watson
text: Great pier

name: Dan 91Lx
text: We fish off this boat pier but it allows people in boats a place to tie your boat up to and walk to Publix to shop for that missed item on your list

name: Brian
text: Great quiet place to fish. Also a great place to launch your boat. It's a 48 mile ride south to Franklin Ferry Marina from here & about 63 miles to Bankhead Dam.

name: Justine Bates
text: You go here just to relax and getaway.. not to actually fish..dont waste your money on bait ..unless your buying to freely feed the fish cause they sure aren't gonna bite them!

name: Andrew Farrow
text: Nice little boat launch where you then have 3 different ways you can head once you are in the river, as for the fishing from the bank, it is a little disappointing, there weren't many fish except for a few smaller bluegill. There was also a lot of trash in the area. Very peaceful area however to be right off a main road.

name: Readi Dusseau
text: Has good area to fish. Fairly clean. I will be going back some time.

name: Danny Niblett
text: Brought back memories from when I was a kid. Love the way it's been cleared back and cleaned up.

name: Gavin Lawler
text: One of my favorite places to go and have a nice day hanging out by the water. You can fish,swim, camp ,picnic has a boat launch.

name: Patrick Lawson
text: Needs a garbage can and some steps but all around pretty good spot to wet a line from the bank

name: Mys D
text: Great place to fish off bank or in boat
